item.title: Michael Minas with Maths games (Covid or not!)
item.description: It's time to revisit the importance of using games in maths classes, even when we're not locked up! This was a podcast originally released in the thick of home based learning in 2020. Marcus Garrett speaks with popular educator and ChooseMATHS award ... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/mathstalk/feed.xml

item.title: Mahe Bayireddi, Co-Founder and CEO of Phenom: How Employers Use AI to Find and Hire Job-Seekers
item.description:
Mahe Bayireddi, Co-Founder and CEO of Phenom

Mahe spells out how employers use artificial intelligence, machine learning and data to hire employees. He explains that job-seekers and other professionals should focus on highlighting their core competencies, skills and behaviors and dives into the tactics to stand out in the job application and job interview processes... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/9575a158/podcast/rss
